title: ADDIE Model-Based Instructional Design for Developing a Mobile App for Infant and Toddler Care Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A blended education program conducted in a limited technological environment (no PCs, smartphone-based), targeting pre-service and in-service teachers, with the goal of acquiring scientific content design and evaluation methods for developing mobile apps for infant and toddler care education

learning_goals: Learners can establish a mobile app development plan for early childhood care education by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation)
Learners can propose content design strategies for early childhood health management that incorporate scientific evidence and expert consultation
Learners can design a user-friendly notification system and emergency guide functionality implementable in smartphone-based constrained environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
